name: Golf 5 eClub
description:
Golf 5 eClub is the new and immersive way to practice authentic golf. Developed using state-of-the-art VR technology, simulates, with an accuracy never experienced before, the ball physics and the dynamics and behavior of golf clubs: woods, irons, wedges and putters, in an enveloping 3D environment with astonishing graphics.

**********************************************************************************************
Compatible VR headsets: Oculus Quest, Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest Pro, Valve Index VR, PICO 4
**********************************************************************************************

Improve your swing and lower your handicap according to the International E-Golf Federation rules, participate in tournaments and become an eGolf Pro!

GOLF COURSE

– Three challenging 18 holes courses are available to play, practice and compete. And more are coming!


The Dunes



Forest



...and Tropical.

GOLF WIPp

– A new way to play golf: quick games where all four golf clubs types, woods, irons, wedges, and putters come into play.


DRIVING RANGE

– A driving range court to practice, warm up or competing using all the available clubs.


PUTTING GREEN

– An astoundingly realistic, fully customizable putting green to practice short shots.


MINI GOLF

- For fun, relax, and initiation to the game of golf.




All the above can be played individually, vs the CPU or online. Compete and chat with friends and family from any corner of the world while playing 18 holes!
